content.body: No idea, either. But I tell you, the more you look at the build stuff for that spec, the more it's gonna make just scratch your head in puzzlement

content.body: Kinda like with the content of the spec itself
That thing has such a long way to go that it makes me wonder if we might be facing a kinda “You can't get there from here” situation
I mean, we might want to be asking if we'd be better off tossing it all and rewriting it from scratch.
…With the caveat for the “we” part meaning, somebody other than me specifically doing the actual work
content.formatted_body: …With the caveat for the “we” part meaning, somebody other than me specifically doing the actual work
